DOC.brief_summary: Mothers Motion draw success pilot intervention name promote healthy lifestyle behavior change ( eat fruit vegetable , increase physical activity , deal stress ) low-income WIC mother young child . The intervention group 's weight change ( difference initial enrollment 3 month post intervention ) differ control group 's weight change average least 2.8 pound .
DOC.brief_title: Mothers Motion Program Prevent Weight Gain WIC Mothers ( MIM )
DOC.detailed_description: Mothers Motion draw success pilot intervention name promote healthy lifestyle behavior change ( eat fruit vegetable , increase physical activity , deal stress ) low-income WIC mother young child . Both treatment group receive usual WIC care ( nutrition counsel similar service ) . The control group receive generic print health nutrition material read pace wish . The intervention group watch culturally sensitive DVD chapter accord study calendar , complete action plan worksheets , call peer support group teleconference discuss DVD chapter content . The teleconference lead moderator train motivational interviewing ( MI ) group factilitation . Participants complete phone interview provide body weight measurement baseline ( T1 ) , immediately ( T2 ) 3 month ( T3 ) intervention time period . T3 body weight primary outcome .
DOC.criteria: African American White Fluent English 1839 year old At least 6 week postpartum Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 25.0 39.9 Willing provide address 3 work phone number Willing update contact information monthly Willing participate project 9 month Willing make 3 additional trip WIC clinic weight measure Working DVD player home access work phone . Pregnant MIM Pilot study participation Plan become pregnant relocate location outside study area trial Selfreported type 1 2 Diabetes Unable walk 1 block without rest shortness breath .
